description: Episode of Series "The Facts Are These". Made before eating disorders were recognised as serious diseases, this documentary focuses on a hospital dietitian, a dentist and women in a dieting club as they discuss the evils of overeating. It also highlights the importance of good nutrition and regular exercise in maintaining a slender figure.
